   20: 
   21: %%%-------------------------------------------------------------------
   22: %%% File: ct_error_SUITE
   23: %%%
   24: %%% Description: 
   25: %%% Test various errors in Common Test suites.
   26: %%%
   27: %%% The suites used for the test are located in the data directory.
   28: %%%-------------------------------------------------------------------
   29: -module(ct_hooks_SUITE).
   30: 
   31: -compile([export_all, nowarn_export_all]).
   32: 
   33: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   34: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct_event.hrl").
   35: -include_lib("kernel/src/logger_internal.hrl").
   36: 
   37: -define(eh, ct_test_support_eh).
   38: -define(cth_event3(CALLBACK, SUITE, VAR1),
   39:         {?eh, cth, {'_', CALLBACK,
   40:                     [SUITE, VAR1, '_']}}).
   41: -define(cth_event4(CALLBACK, SUITE, VAR1, VAR2),
   42:         {?eh, cth, {'_', CALLBACK,
   43:                     [SUITE, VAR1, VAR2, '_']}}).
   44: -define(cth_event5(CALLBACK, SUITE, VAR1, VAR2, VAR3),
   45:         {?eh, cth, {'_', CALLBACK,
   46:                     [SUITE, VAR1, VAR2, VAR3, '_']}}).
   47: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   48: %% TEST SERVER CALLBACK FUNCTIONS
   49: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   50: 
   51: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   52: %% Description: Since Common Test starts another Test Server
   53: %% instance, the tests need to be performed on a separate node (or
   54: %% there will be clashes with logging processes etc).
   55: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   56: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   57:     DataDir = ?config(data_dir, Config),
   58:     TestDir = filename:join(DataDir,"cth/tests/"),
   59:     CTHs = filelib:wildcard(filename:join(TestDir,"*_cth.erl")),
   60:     io:format("CTHs: ~p",[CTHs]),
   61:     [io:format("Compiling ~p: ~p",
   62: 	    [FileName,compile:file(FileName,[{outdir,TestDir},debug_info])]) ||
   63: 	FileName <- CTHs],
   64:     ct_test_support:init_per_suite([{path_dirs,[TestDir]} | Config]).
   65: 
   66: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   67:     ct_test_support:end_per_suite(Config).
   68: 
   69: init_per_testcase(TestCase, Config) ->
   70:     ct_test_support:init_per_testcase(TestCase, Config).
   71: 
   72: 
   73: end_per_testcase(cth_log_formatter = TestCase, Config) ->
   74:     ct_test_support:ct_rpc(
   75:       {logger,set_handler_config,
   76:        [default, formatter,
   77:         {?DEFAULT_FORMATTER,?DEFAULT_FORMAT_CONFIG}]}, Config),
   78:     ct_test_support:end_per_testcase(TestCase, Config);
   79: end_per_testcase(TestCase, Config) ->
   80:     ct_test_support:end_per_testcase(TestCase, Config).
   81: 
   82: 
   83: suite() ->
   84:     [{timetrap,{minutes,1}}].
   85: 
   86: all() ->
   87:     all(suite).
   88: 
   89: all(suite) ->
   90:     lists:reverse(
   91:       [
   92:        crash_groups, crash_all, bad_return_groups, bad_return_all,
   93:        illegal_values_groups, illegal_values_all, alter_groups, alter_all,
   94:        alter_all_to_skip, alter_all_from_skip,
   95:        one_cth, two_cth, faulty_cth_no_init, faulty_cth_id_no_init,
   96:        faulty_cth_exit_in_init, faulty_cth_exit_in_id,
   97:        faulty_cth_exit_in_init_scope_suite, minimal_cth,
   98:        minimal_and_maximal_cth, faulty_cth_undef,
   99:        scope_per_suite_cth, scope_per_group_cth, scope_suite_cth,
  100:        scope_suite_group_only_cth,
  101:        scope_per_suite_state_cth, scope_per_group_state_cth,
  102:        scope_suite_state_cth,
  103:        fail_pre_suite_cth, double_fail_pre_suite_cth,
  104:        fail_post_suite_cth, skip_pre_suite_cth, skip_pre_end_cth,
  105:        skip_pre_init_tc_cth, fail_post_init_tc_cth,
  106:        skip_post_suite_cth, recover_post_suite_cth, update_config_cth,
  107:        update_config_cth2,
  108:        ct_hooks_order_test_cth, ct_hooks_order_config_suite_cth,
  109:        ct_hooks_order_config_ips_cth,
  110:        state_update_cth, update_result_cth, options_cth, same_id_cth,
  111:        fail_n_skip_with_minimal_cth, prio_cth, no_config,
  112:        no_init_suite_config, no_init_config, no_end_config,
  113:        failed_sequence, repeat_force_stop, config_clash,
  114:        callbacks_on_skip, fallback, data_dir,
  115:        cth_log, cth_log_formatter, cth_log_unexpect
  116:       ]
  117:     ).
  118: 
  119: 
  120: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  121: %% TEST CASES
  122: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  123: 
  124: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  125: %%% 
  126: one_cth(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  127:     do_test(one_empty_cth, "ct_cth_empty_SUITE.erl",[empty_cth], Config).
  128: 
  129: two_cth(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  130:     do_test(two_empty_cth, "ct_cth_empty_SUITE.erl",[empty_cth,empty_cth],
  131: 	    Config).
  132: 
  133: faulty_cth_no_init(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  134:     do_test(faulty_cth_no_init, "ct_cth_empty_SUITE.erl",[askjhdkljashdkaj],
  135: 	    Config,{error,"Failed to start CTH, see the "
  136: 		   "CT Log for details"}).
  137:

  299: 
  300: cth_log(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  301:     %% test that cth_log_redirect writes properly to
  302:     %% html I/O log
  303:     ct:timetrap({minutes,10}),
  304:     StartOpts = do_test(cth_log, "cth_log_SUITE.erl", [], Config),
  305:     Logdir = proplists:get_value(logdir, StartOpts),
  306:     TCLogs =
  307: 	filelib:wildcard(
  308: 	  filename:join(Logdir,
  309: 			"ct_run*/cth.tests*/run*/cth_log_suite.tc*.html")),
  310:     lists:foreach(
  311:       fun(TCLog) ->
  312: 	      {ok,Bin} = file:read_file(TCLog),
  313: 	      Ts = string:lexemes(binary_to_list(Bin),[$\n]),
  314: 	      Matches = lists:foldl(fun("=ERROR"++_,  {E,I,N,L}) ->
  315: 					    {E+1,I,N,L};
  316: 				       ("=INFO"++_,  {E,I,N,L}) ->
  317: 					    {E,I+1,N,L};
  318: 				       ("=NOTICE"++_,  {E,I,N,L}) ->
  319: 					    {E,I,N+1,L};
  320: 				       ("Logger"++_,  {E,I,N,L}) ->
  321: 					    {E,I,N,L+1};
  322: 				       (_, N) -> N
  323: 				    end, {0,0,0,0}, Ts),
  324: 	      ct:pal("~p ({Error,Info,Notice,Log}) matches in ~tp",
  325:                      [Matches,TCLog]),
  326:               MatchList = tuple_to_list(Matches),
  327:               case [N || N <- MatchList, N<1] of
  328:                   [] -> ok;
  329:                   _ -> exit({missing_io,TCLog})
  330: 	      end
  331:       end, TCLogs),
  332:     ok.
  333: 
  334: cth_log_formatter(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  335:     %% test that cth_log_redirect writes properly to
  336:     %% html I/O log using the formatter
  337:     ct:timetrap({minutes,10}),
  338:     ct_test_support:ct_rpc({logger,set_handler_config,[default, formatter,
  339:                               {logger_formatter,#{ template => [level,":",msg,"\n"] }}]},
  340:                            Config),
  341:     StartOpts = do_test(cth_log_formatter, "cth_log_formatter_SUITE.erl", [], Config),
  342:     Logdir = proplists:get_value(logdir, StartOpts),
  343:     TCLogs =
  344: 	filelib:wildcard(
  345: 	  filename:join(Logdir,
  346: 			"ct_run*/cth.tests*/run*/cth_log_formatter_suite.tc*.html")),
  347:     lists:foreach(
  348:       fun(TCLog) ->
  349: 	      {ok,Bin} = file:read_file(TCLog),
  350: 	      Ts = string:lexemes(binary_to_list(Bin),[$\n]),
  351: 	      Matches = lists:foldl(fun("error:"++_,  {E,N,L}) ->
  352: 					    {E+1,N,L};
  353: 				       ("notice:"++_,  {E,N,L}) ->
  354: 					    {E,N+1,L};
  355: 				       ("Logger"++_,  {E,N,L}) ->
  356: 					    {E,N,L+1};
  357: 				       (_, N) -> N
  358: 				    end, {0,0,0}, Ts),
  359: 	      ct:pal("~p ({Error,Notice,Log}) matches in ~tp",
  360:                      [Matches,TCLog]),
  361:               MatchList = tuple_to_list(Matches),
  362:               case [N || N <- MatchList, N<1] of
  363:                   [] -> ok;
  364:                   _ -> exit({missing_io,TCLog})
  365: 	      end
  366:       end, TCLogs),
  367:     ok.
  368: 
  369: cth_log_unexpect(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  370:     %% test that cth_log_redirect writes properly to
  371:     %% unexpected I/O log
  372:     ct:timetrap({minutes,10}),
  373:     StartOpts = do_test(cth_log_unexpect, "cth_log_unexpect_SUITE.erl", [], Config),
  374:     Logdir = proplists:get_value(logdir, StartOpts),
  375:     UnexpIoLogs =
  376: 	filelib:wildcard(
  377: 	  filename:join(Logdir,
  378: 			"ct_run*/cth.tests*/run*/unexpected_io.log.html")),
  379:     lists:foreach(
  380:       fun(UnexpIoLog) ->
  381: 	      {ok,Bin} = file:read_file(UnexpIoLog),
  382: 	      Ts = string:lexemes(binary_to_list(Bin),[$\n]),
  383: 	      Matches = lists:foldl(fun("=ERROR"++_,  {E,I,L}) ->
  384: 					    {E+1,I,L};
  385: 				       ("=INFO"++_,  {E,I,L}) ->
  386: 					    {E,I+1,L};
  387: 				       ("Logger"++_,  {E,I,L}) ->
  388: 					    {E,I,L+1};
  389: 				       (_, N) -> N
  390: 				    end, {0,0,0}, Ts),
  391: 	      ct:pal("~p ({Error,Info,Log}) matches in ~tp",
  392:                      [Matches,UnexpIoLog]),
  393:               MatchList = tuple_to_list(Matches),
  394:               case [N || N <- MatchList, N<3] of
  395:                   [] -> ok;
  396:                   _ -> exit({missing_unexpected_io,UnexpIoLog})
  397: 	      end
  398:       end, UnexpIoLogs),
  399:     ok.
  400: 
  401: %% OTP-10599 adds the Suite argument as first argument to all hook
  402: %% callbacks that did not have a Suite argument from before. This test
  403: %% checks that ct_hooks will fall back to old versions of callbacks if
  404: %% new versions are not exported.
  405: fallback(Config) ->
  406:     do_test(fallback, "all_hook_callbacks_SUITE.erl",[fallback_cth], Config).
  407: 
  408: %% Test that expected callbacks, and only those, are called when tests
  409: %% are skipped in different ways
  410: callbacks_on_skip(Config) ->
  411:     do_test(callbacks_on_skip, {spec,"skip.spec"},[skip_cth], Config).
  412: 
  413: %% Test that expected callbacks, and only those, are called when tests
  414: %% are skipped due to failed sequence
  415: failed_sequence(Config) ->
  416:     do_test(failed_sequence, "seq_SUITE.erl", [skip_cth], Config).
  417: 
  418: %% Test that expected callbacks, and only those, are called when tests
  419: %% are skipped due to {force_stop,skip_rest} option
  420: repeat_force_stop(Config) ->
  421:     do_test(repeat_force_stop, "repeat_SUITE.erl", [skip_cth], Config, ok, 2,
  422:             [{force_stop,skip_rest},{duration,"000009"}]).
  423: 
  424: %% Test that expected callbacks, and only those, are called when a test
  425: %% fails due to clash in config alias names
  426: config_clash(Config) ->
  427:     do_test(config_clash, "config_clash_SUITE.erl", [skip_cth], Config).
  428: 
  429: %% Test post_groups and post_all hook callbacks, introduced by OTP-14746
  430: alter_groups(Config) ->
  431:     CfgFile = gen_config(?FUNCTION_NAME,
  432:                          [{post_groups_return,[{new_group,[tc1,tc2]}]},
  433:                           {post_all_return,[{group,new_group}]}],Config),
  434:     do_test(?FUNCTION_NAME, "all_and_groups_SUITE.erl", [all_and_groups_cth],
  435:             Config, ok, 2, [{config,CfgFile}]).
  436: 
  437: alter_all(Config) ->
  438:     CfgFile = gen_config(?FUNCTION_NAME,[{post_all_return,[tc2]}],Config),
  439:     do_test(?FUNCTION_NAME, "all_and_groups_SUITE.erl", [all_and_groups_cth],
  440:             Config, ok, 2, [{config,CfgFile}]).
  441: 
  442: alter_all_from_skip(Config) ->
  443:     CfgFile = gen_config(?FUNCTION_NAME,[{all_return,{skip,"skipped by all/0"}},
  444:                                          {post_all_return,[tc2]}],Config),
  445:     do_test(?FUNCTION_NAME, "all_and_groups_SUITE.erl", [all_and_groups_cth],
  446:             Config, ok, 2, [{config,CfgFile}]).
  447: 
  448: alter_all_to_skip(Config) ->
  449:     CfgFile = gen_config(?FUNCTION_NAME,
  450:                          [{post_all_return,{skip,"skipped by post_all/3"}}],
  451:                          Config),
  452:     do_test(?FUNCTION_NAME, "all_and_groups_SUITE.erl", [all_and_groups_cth],
  453:             Config, ok, 2, [{config,CfgFile}]).
  454: 
  455: bad_return_groups(Config) ->
  456:     CfgFile = gen_config(?FUNCTION_NAME,[{post_groups_return,not_a_list}],
  457:                          Config),
  458:     do_test(?FUNCTION_NAME, "all_and_groups_SUITE.erl", [all_and_groups_cth],
  459:             Config, ok, 2, [{config,CfgFile}]).
  460: 
  461: bad_return_all(Config) ->
  462:     CfgFile = gen_config(?FUNCTION_NAME,[{post_all_return,not_a_list}],
  463:                          Config),
  464:     do_test(?FUNCTION_NAME, "all_and_groups_SUITE.erl", [all_and_groups_cth],
  465:             Config, ok, 2, [{config,CfgFile}]).
  466: 
  467: illegal_values_groups(Config) ->
  468:     CfgFile = gen_config(?FUNCTION_NAME,
  469:                          [{post_groups_return,[{new_group,[this_test_does_not_exist]},
  470:                                           this_is_not_a_group_def]}],
  471:                          Config),
  472:     do_test(?FUNCTION_NAME, "all_and_groups_SUITE.erl", [all_and_groups_cth],
  473:             Config, ok, 2, [{config,CfgFile}]).
  474: 
  475: illegal_values_all(Config) ->
  476:     CfgFile = gen_config(?FUNCTION_NAME,
  477:                          [{post_all_return,[{group,this_group_does_not_exist},
  478:                                        {this_is_not_a_valid_term}]}],
  479:                          Config),
  480:     do_test(?FUNCTION_NAME, "all_and_groups_SUITE.erl", [all_and_groups_cth],
  481:             Config, ok, 2, [{config,CfgFile}]).
  482: 
  483: crash_groups(Config) ->
  484:     CfgFile = gen_config(?FUNCTION_NAME,[{post_groups_return,crash}],Config),
  485:     do_test(?FUNCTION_NAME, "all_and_groups_SUITE.erl", [all_and_groups_cth],
  486:             Config, ok, 2, [{config,CfgFile}]).
  487: 
  488: crash_all(Config) ->
  489:     CfgFile = gen_config(?FUNCTION_NAME,[{post_all_return,crash}],Config),
  490:     do_test(?FUNCTION_NAME, "all_and_groups_SUITE.erl", [all_and_groups_cth],
  491:             Config, ok, 2, [{config,CfgFile}]).
  492: 
  493: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  494: %%% HELP FUNCTIONS
  495: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  496: 
  497: do_test(Tag, WTT, CTHs, Config) ->
  498:     do_test(Tag, WTT, CTHs, Config, ok).
  499: do_test(Tag, WTT, CTHs, Config, {error,_} = Res) ->
  500:     do_test(Tag, WTT, CTHs, Config, Res, 1,[]);
  501: do_test(Tag, WTT, CTHs, Config, Res) ->
  502:     do_test(Tag, WTT, CTHs, Config, Res, 2,[]).
  503: 
  504: do_test(Tag, WhatToTest, CTHs, Config, Res, EC, ExtraOpts) when is_list(WhatToTest) ->
  505:     do_test(Tag, {suite,WhatToTest}, CTHs, Config, Res, EC, ExtraOpts);
  506: do_test(Tag, {WhatTag,Wildcard}, CTHs, Config, Res, EC, ExtraOpts) ->
  507:     DataDir = ?config(data_dir, Config),
  508:     Files = filelib:wildcard(
  509:                filename:join([DataDir,"cth/tests",Wildcard])),
  510:     {Opts,ERPid} =
  511:         setup([{WhatTag,Files},{ct_hooks,CTHs},{label,Tag}|ExtraOpts], Config),
  512: 
  513:     Res = ct_test_support:run(Opts, Config),
  514:     Events = ct_test_support:get_events(ERPid, Config),
  515: 
  516:     ct_test_support:log_events(Tag,
  517: 			       reformat(Events, ?eh),
  518: 			       ?config(priv_dir, Config),
  519: 			       Opts),
  520: 
  521:     TestEvents = events_to_check(Tag, EC),
  522:     ok = ct_test_support:verify_events(TestEvents, Events, Config),
  523:     Opts.
  524: 
  525: setup(Test, Config) ->
  526:     Opts0 = ct_test_support:get_opts(Config),
  527:     Level = ?config(trace_level, Config),
  528:     EvHArgs = [{cbm,ct_test_support},{trace_level,Level}],
  529:     Opts = Opts0 ++ [{event_handler,{?eh,EvHArgs}}|Test],
  530:     ERPid = ct_test_support:start_event_receiver(Config),
  531:     {Opts,ERPid}.
  532: 
  533: reformat(Events, EH) ->
  534:     ct_test_support:reformat(Events, EH).
  535: %reformat(Events, _EH) ->
  536: %    Events.
  537: 
  538: gen_config(Name,KeyVals,Config) ->
  539:     PrivDir = ?config(priv_dir,Config),
  540:     File = filename:join(PrivDir,atom_to_list(Name)++".cfg"),
  541:     ok = file:write_file(File,[io_lib:format("~p.~n",[{Key,Value}])
  542:                                || {Key,Value} <- KeyVals]),
  543:     File.
  544: 
  545: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  546: %%% TEST EVENTS
  547: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  548: events_to_check(Test) ->
  549:     %% 2 tests (ct:run_test + script_start) is default
  550:     events_to_check(Test, 2).
  551: 
  552: events_to_check(_, 0) ->
  553:     [];
  554: events_to_check(Test, N) ->
  555:     test_events(Test) ++ events_to_check(Test, N-1).
  556: 
  557: test_events(one_empty_cth) ->
  558:     [
  559:      {?eh,start_logging,{'DEF','RUNDIR'}},
  560:      {?eh,test_start,{'DEF',{'START_TIME','LOGDIR'}}},
  561:      {?eh,cth,{empty_cth,id,[[]]}},
  562:      {?eh,cth,{empty_cth,init,[{'_','_','_'},[]]}},
  563:      %% check that post_groups and post_all comes after init when hook
  564:      %% is installed with start flag/option.
  565:      {?eh,cth,{empty_cth,post_groups,[ct_cth_empty_SUITE,[]]}},
  566:      {?eh,cth,{empty_cth,post_all,[ct_cth_empty_SUITE,[test_case],[]]}},
  567:      {?eh,tc_start,{ct_cth_empty_SUITE,init_per_suite}},
  568:      {?eh,cth,{empty_cth,pre_init_per_suite,
  569: 	       [ct_cth_empty_SUITE,'$proplist',[]]}},
  570:      {?eh,cth,{empty_cth,post_init_per_suite,
  571: 	       [ct_cth_empty_SUITE,'$proplist','$proplist',[]]}},
  572:      {?eh,tc_done,{ct_cth_empty_SUITE,init_per_suite,ok}},
  573:      {?eh,tc_start,{ct_cth_empty_SUITE,test_case}},
  574:      {?eh,cth,{empty_cth,pre_init_per_testcase,[ct_cth_empty_SUITE,test_case,'$proplist',[]]}},
  575:      {?eh,cth,{empty_cth,post_init_per_testcase,[ct_cth_empty_SUITE,test_case,'$proplist','_',[]]}},
  576:      {?eh,cth,{empty_cth,pre_end_per_testcase,[ct_cth_empty_SUITE,test_case,'$proplist',[]]}},
  577:      {?eh,cth,{empty_cth,post_end_per_testcase,[ct_cth_empty_SUITE,test_case,'$proplist','_',[]]}},
  578:      {?eh,tc_done,{ct_cth_empty_SUITE,test_case,ok}},
  579: 
  580:      {?eh,tc_start,{ct_cth_empty_SUITE,end_per_suite}},
  581:      {?eh,cth,{empty_cth,pre_end_per_suite,
  582: 	       [ct_cth_empty_SUITE,'$proplist',[]]}},
  583:      {?eh,cth,{empty_cth,post_end_per_suite,[ct_cth_empty_SUITE,'$proplist','_',[]]}},
  584:      {?eh,tc_done,{ct_cth_empty_SUITE,end_per_suite,ok}},
  585:      {?eh,test_done,{'DEF','STOP_TIME'}},
  586:      {?eh,cth,{empty_cth,terminate,[[]]}},
  587:      {?eh,stop_logging,[]}
  588:     ];
  589:

  777: test_events(scope_suite_cth) ->
  778:     [
  779:      {?eh,start_logging,{'DEF','RUNDIR'}},
  780:      {?eh,test_start,{'DEF',{'START_TIME','LOGDIR'}}},
  781:      %% check that post_groups and post_all comes before init when hook
  782:      %% is installed in suite/0
  783:      %% And there should be no terminate after these, since init is
  784:      %% not yet called.
  785:      {?eh,cth,{'_',post_groups,['_',[]]}},
  786:      {negative,
  787:       {?eh,cth,{'_',terminate,['_']}},
  788:       {?eh,cth,{'_',post_all,['_','_',[]]}}},
  789:      {negative,
  790:       {?eh,cth,{'_',terminate,['_']}},
  791:       {?eh,tc_start,{ct_scope_suite_cth_SUITE,init_per_suite}}},
  792:      {?eh,cth,{'_',id,[[]]}},
  793:      {?eh,cth,{'_',init,['_',[]]}},
  794:      {?eh,cth,{'_',pre_init_per_suite,[ct_scope_suite_cth_SUITE,'$proplist',[]]}},
  795:      {?eh,cth,{'_',post_init_per_suite,[ct_scope_suite_cth_SUITE,'$proplist','$proplist',[]]}},
  796:      {?eh,tc_done,{ct_scope_suite_cth_SUITE,init_per_suite,ok}},

  798:      {?eh,tc_start,{ct_scope_suite_cth_SUITE,test_case}},
  799:      {?eh,cth,{'_',pre_init_per_testcase,[ct_scope_suite_cth_SUITE,test_case,'$proplist',[]]}},

  801:      {?eh,tc_done,{ct_scope_suite_cth_SUITE,test_case,ok}},
  802: 
  803:      {?eh,tc_start,{ct_scope_suite_cth_SUITE,end_per_suite}},
  804:      {?eh,cth,{'_',pre_end_per_suite,[ct_scope_suite_cth_SUITE,'$proplist',[]]}},

  812: test_events(scope_suite_group_only_cth) ->
  813:     Suite = ct_scope_suite_group_only_cth_SUITE,
  814:     CTH = empty_cth,
  815:     [
  816:      {?eh,start_logging,{'DEF','RUNDIR'}},
  817:      {?eh,test_start,{'DEF',{'START_TIME','LOGDIR'}}},
  818:      {?eh,start_info,{1,1,1}},
  819:      %% check that post_groups and post_all comes before init when hook
  820:      %% is installed in suite/0
  821:      {?eh,cth,{CTH,post_groups,['_',['_']]}},
  822:      {negative,
  823:       {?eh,cth,{CTH,post_all,['_','_','_']}},
  824:       {?eh,tc_start,{Suite,init_per_suite}}},
  825:      {?eh,cth,{CTH,id,[[]]}},
  826:      {?eh,cth,{CTH,init,['_',[]]}},
  827:      {?eh,cth,{CTH,pre_init_per_suite,[Suite,'$proplist',mystate]}},
  828:      {?eh,cth,{CTH,post_init_per_suite,[Suite,'$proplist','$proplist',mystate]}},
  829:      {?eh,tc_done,{Suite,init_per_suite,ok}},
  830: 
  831:      {?eh,tc_start,{Suite,end_per_suite}},
  832:      {?eh,cth,{CTH,pre_end_per_suite,[Suite,'$proplist',mystate]}},
  833:      {?eh,cth,{CTH,post_end_per_suite,[Suite,'$proplist','_',mystate]}},
  834:      {?eh,cth,{CTH,terminate,[mystate]}},
  835:      {?eh,tc_done,{Suite,end_per_suite,ok}},
  836:      {?eh,test_done,{'DEF','STOP_TIME'}},
  837:      {?eh,stop_logging,[]}
  838:     ];
  839: 
  840: test_events(scope_per_group_cth) ->
  841:     [
  842:      {?eh,start_logging,{'DEF','RUNDIR'}},
  843:      {?eh,test_start,{'DEF',{'START_TIME','LOGDIR'}}},
  844:      {?eh,tc_start,{ct_scope_per_group_cth_SUITE,init_per_suite}},
  845:      {?eh,tc_done,{ct_scope_per_group_cth_SUITE,init_per_suite,ok}},

  848:       {?eh,cth,{'_',id,[[]]}},
  849:       {?eh,cth,{'_',init,['_',[]]}},
  850:       {?eh,cth,{'_',post_init_per_group,[ct_scope_per_group_cth_SUITE,group1, '$proplist','$proplist',[]]}},
  851:       {?eh,tc_done,{ct_scope_per_group_cth_SUITE,{init_per_group,group1,[]},ok}},

  854:       {?eh,cth,{'_',pre_init_per_testcase,[ct_scope_per_group_cth_SUITE,test_case,'$proplist',[]]}},

  856:       {?eh,tc_done,{ct_scope_per_group_cth_SUITE,test_case,ok}},
  857: 
  858:       {?eh,tc_start,{ct_scope_per_group_cth_SUITE,{end_per_group,group1,[]}}},
  859:       {?eh,cth,{'_',pre_end_per_group,[ct_scope_per_group_cth_SUITE,group1,'$proplist',[]]}},
  860:       {?eh,cth,{'_',post_end_per_group,[ct_scope_per_group_cth_SUITE,group1,'$proplist','_',[]]}},
  861:       {?eh,cth,{'_',terminate,[[]]}},

  952: test_events(fail_pre_suite_cth) ->
  953:     [
  954:      {?eh,start_logging,{'DEF','RUNDIR'}},
  955:      {?eh,test_start,{'DEF',{'START_TIME','LOGDIR'}}},
  956:      {?eh,cth,{'_',init,['_',[]]}},

  959:      {?eh,cth,{'_',pre_init_per_suite,[ct_cth_empty_SUITE,'$proplist',[]]}},
  960:      {?eh,cth,{'_',post_init_per_suite,[ct_cth_empty_SUITE,'$proplist',
  961: 					{fail,"Test failure"},[]]}},
  962:      {?eh,tc_done,{ct_cth_empty_SUITE,init_per_suite,
  963:                    {failed, {error,"Test failure"}}}},
  964:      {?eh,cth,{'_',on_tc_fail,
  965: 	       [ct_cth_empty_SUITE,init_per_suite,"Test failure",[]]}},
  966: 
  967: 
  968:      {?eh,tc_auto_skip,{ct_cth_empty_SUITE,test_case,
  969:                         {failed,{ct_cth_empty_SUITE,init_per_suite,
  970: 				 {failed,"Test failure"}}}}},
  971:      {?eh,cth,{'_',on_tc_skip,
  972: 	       [ct_cth_empty_SUITE,test_case, {tc_auto_skip,
  973: 			    {failed, {ct_cth_empty_SUITE, init_per_suite,
  974: 				     {failed, "Test failure"}}}},[]]}},
  975: 
  976: 
  977:      {?eh,tc_auto_skip, {ct_cth_empty_SUITE, end_per_suite,
  978:                          {failed, {ct_cth_empty_SUITE, init_per_suite,
  979: 				   {failed, "Test failure"}}}}},
  980:      {?eh,cth,{'_',on_tc_skip,
  981: 	       [ct_cth_empty_SUITE,end_per_suite, {tc_auto_skip,
  982: 				{failed, {ct_cth_empty_SUITE, init_per_suite,
  983: 					  {failed, "Test failure"}}}},[]]}},
  984: 
  985: 
  986:      {?eh,test_done,{'DEF','STOP_TIME'}},
  987:      {?eh,cth, {'_',terminate,[[]]}},
  988:      {?eh,stop_logging,[]}
  989:     ];

 1281: test_events(update_config_cth2) ->

 1284:         fun(Case, Result) ->
 1285:                 {PreEndPerTestcaseHookEventAdd, PostEndPerTestcaseEventAdd} =
 1286:                     %% Case below is unexpected thing which needs clarification

 1288:                     case lists:member(Case, [test_case_timetrap]) of

 1290:                             {[], []};

 1570:      {?eh,cth,{empty_cth,post_init_per_suite,
 1571: 	       [ct_cth_empty_SUITE,'$proplist','$proplist',[test]]}},
 1572:      {?eh,tc_done,{ct_cth_empty_SUITE,init_per_suite,ok}},
 1573: 
 1574:      {?eh,tc_start,{ct_cth_empty_SUITE,test_case}},
 1575:      {?eh,cth,{empty_cth,pre_init_per_testcase,[ct_cth_empty_SUITE,test_case,'$proplist',[test]]}},
 1576:      {?eh,cth,{empty_cth,post_end_per_testcase,[ct_cth_empty_SUITE,test_case,'$proplist','_',[test]]}},
 1577:      {?eh,tc_done,{ct_cth_empty_SUITE,test_case,ok}},
 1578: 
 1579:      {?eh,tc_start,{ct_cth_empty_SUITE,end_per_suite}},
 1580:      {?eh,cth,{empty_cth,pre_end_per_suite,
 1581: 	       [ct_cth_empty_SUITE,'$proplist',[test]]}},
 1582:      {?eh,cth,{empty_cth,post_end_per_suite,[ct_cth_empty_SUITE,'$proplist','_',[test]]}},
 1583:      {?eh,tc_done,{ct_cth_empty_SUITE,end_per_suite,ok}},
 1584:      {?eh,test_done,{'DEF','STOP_TIME'}},
 1585:      {?eh,cth,{empty_cth,terminate,[[test]]}},
 1586:      {?eh,stop_logging,[]}
 1587:     ];
 1588: 
 1589: test_events(same_id_cth) ->
 1590:     [
 1591:      {?eh,start_logging,{'DEF','RUNDIR'}},
 1592:      {?eh,test_start,{'DEF',{'START_TIME','LOGDIR'}}},

 1597:      {?eh,cth,{'_',pre_init_per_suite,[ct_cth_empty_SUITE,'$proplist',[]]}},
 1598:      {negative,
 1599:        {?eh,cth,{'_',pre_init_per_suite,[ct_cth_empty_SUITE,'$proplist',[]]}},
 1600:       {?eh,cth,{'_',post_init_per_suite,

 1630: test_events(fail_n_skip_with_minimal_cth) ->
 1631:     [{?eh,start_logging,{'DEF','RUNDIR'}},
 1632:      {?eh,test_start,{'DEF',{'START_TIME','LOGDIR'}}},
 1633:      {?eh,cth,{'_',init,['_',[]]}},
 1634:      {?eh,tc_start,{'_',init_per_suite}},
 1635: 
 1636:      {parallel,
 1637:       [{?eh,tc_start,{ct_cth_fail_one_skip_one_SUITE,{init_per_group,
 1638: 						      group1,[parallel]}}},
 1639:        {?eh,tc_done,{ct_cth_fail_one_skip_one_SUITE,{init_per_group,
 1640: 						     group1,[parallel]},ok}},
 1641:        {parallel,
 1642: 	[{?eh,tc_start,{ct_cth_fail_one_skip_one_SUITE,{init_per_group,
 1643: 							group2,[parallel]}}},
 1644: 	 {?eh,tc_done,{ct_cth_fail_one_skip_one_SUITE,{init_per_group,
 1645: 						       group2,[parallel]},ok}},
 1646: 	 %% Verify that 'skip' as well as 'skipped' works
 1647: 	 {?eh,tc_start,{ct_cth_fail_one_skip_one_SUITE,test_case2}},
 1648: 	 {?eh,tc_done,{ct_cth_fail_one_skip_one_SUITE,test_case2,{skipped,"skip it"}}},
 1649: 	 {?eh,tc_start,{ct_cth_fail_one_skip_one_SUITE,test_case3}},
 1650: 	 {?eh,tc_done,{ct_cth_fail_one_skip_one_SUITE,test_case3,{skipped,"skip it"}}},
 1651: 	 {?eh,cth,{empty_cth,on_tc_skip,[ct_cth_fail_one_skip_one_SUITE,
 1652:                                          {test_case2,group2},
 1653: 					 {tc_user_skip,"skip it"},
 1654: 					 []]}},
 1655: 	 {?eh,cth,{empty_cth,on_tc_skip,[ct_cth_fail_one_skip_one_SUITE,
 1656:                                          {test_case3,group2},
 1657: 					 {tc_user_skip,"skip it"},
 1658: 					 []]}},
 1659: 	 {?eh,tc_start,{ct_cth_fail_one_skip_one_SUITE,{end_per_group,
 1660: 							group2,[parallel]}}},
 1661: 	 {?eh,tc_done,{ct_cth_fail_one_skip_one_SUITE,{end_per_group,group2,
 1662: 						       [parallel]},ok}}]},
 1663:        {?eh,tc_start,{ct_cth_fail_one_skip_one_SUITE,{end_per_group,
 1664: 						      group1,[parallel]}}},
 1665:        {?eh,tc_done,{ct_cth_fail_one_skip_one_SUITE,{end_per_group,
 1666: 						     group1,[parallel]},ok}}]},
 1667: 
 1668:      {?eh,tc_done,{'_',end_per_suite,ok}},
 1669:      {?eh,cth,{'_',terminate,[[]]}},
 1670:      {?eh,stop_logging,[]}
 1671:     ];
 1672: 
 1673: test_events(prio_cth) ->
 1674:     GenPre = fun(Func,States) when Func==pre_init_per_suite;
 1675:                                    Func==pre_end_per_suite ->
 1676: 		     [{?eh,cth,{'_',Func,['_','_',State]}} ||
 1677:                          State <- States];
 1678:                 (Func,States) ->
 1679: 		     [{?eh,cth,{'_',Func,['_','_','_',State]}} ||
 1680: 			 State <- States]
 1681: 	     end,
 1682: 
 1683:     GenPost = fun(Func,States) when Func==post_init_per_suite;
 1684:                                     Func==post_end_per_suite ->
 1685: 		      [{?eh,cth,{'_',Func,['_','_','_',State]}} ||
 1686: 			  State <- States];
 1687:                  (Func,States) ->
 1688: 		      [{?eh,cth,{'_',Func,['_','_','_','_',State]}} ||
 1689: 			  State <- States]
 1690: 
 1691:               end,
 1692: 
 1693:     [{?eh,start_logging,{'DEF','RUNDIR'}},
 1694:      {?eh,test_start,{'DEF',{'START_TIME','LOGDIR'}}}] ++
 1695: 
 1696: 	[{?eh,tc_start,{ct_cth_prio_SUITE,init_per_suite}}] ++
 1697: 	GenPre(pre_init_per_suite,
 1698: 	       [[1100,100],[800],[900],[1000],[1200,1050],[1100],[1200]]) ++
 1699: 	GenPost(post_init_per_suite,
 1700: 		[[1100,100],[600,200],[600,600],[700],[800],[900],[1000],
 1701: 		 [1200,1050],[1100],[1200]]) ++
 1702: 	[{?eh,tc_done,{ct_cth_prio_SUITE,init_per_suite,ok}},
 1703: 
 1704: 
 1705: 	 [{?eh,tc_start,{ct_cth_prio_SUITE,{init_per_group,'_',[]}}}] ++
 1706: 	     GenPre(pre_init_per_group,
 1707: 		    [[1100,100],[600,200],[600,600],[700],[800],
 1708: 		     [900],[1000],[1200,1050],[1100],[1200]]) ++
 1709: 	     GenPost(post_init_per_group,
 1710: 		     [[1100,100],[600,200],[600,600],[600],[700],[800],
 1711: 		      [900],[900,900],[500,900],[1000],[1200,1050],
 1712: 		      [1100],[1200]]) ++
 1713: 	     [{?eh,tc_done,{ct_cth_prio_SUITE,{init_per_group,'_',[]},ok}}] ++
 1714: 
 1715: 	     [{?eh,tc_start,{ct_cth_prio_SUITE,test_case}}] ++
 1716: 	     GenPre(pre_init_per_testcase,
 1717: 		    [[1100,100],[600,200],[600,600],[600],[700],[800],
 1718: 		     [900],[900,900],[500,900],[1000],[1200,1050],
 1719: 		     [1100],[1200]]) ++
 1720: 	     GenPost(post_end_per_testcase,
 1721: 		     lists:reverse(
 1722: 		       [[1100,100],[600,200],[600,600],[600],[700],[800],
 1723: 			[900],[900,900],[500,900],[1000],[1200,1050],
 1724: 			[1100],[1200]])) ++
 1725: 	     [{?eh,tc_done,{ct_cth_prio_SUITE,test_case,ok}},
 1726: 
 1727: 	      {?eh,tc_start,{ct_cth_prio_SUITE,{end_per_group,'_',[]}}}] ++
 1728: 	     GenPre(pre_end_per_group,
 1729: 		    lists:reverse(
 1730: 		      [[1100,100],[600,200],[600,600],[600],[700],[800],
 1731: 		       [900],[900,900],[500,900],[1000],[1200,1050],
 1732: 		       [1100],[1200]])) ++
 1733: 	     GenPost(post_end_per_group,
 1734: 		     lists:reverse(
 1735: 		       [[1100,100],[600,200],[600,600],[600],[700],[800],
 1736: 			[900],[900,900],[500,900],[1000],[1200,1050],
 1737: 			[1100],[1200]])) ++
 1738: 	     [{?eh,tc_done,{ct_cth_prio_SUITE,{end_per_group,'_',[]},ok}}],
 1739: 
 1740: 	 {?eh,tc_start,{ct_cth_prio_SUITE,end_per_suite}}] ++
 1741: 	GenPre(pre_end_per_suite,
 1742: 	       lists:reverse(
 1743: 		 [[1100,100],[600,200],[600,600],[700],[800],[900],[1000],
 1744: 		  [1200,1050],[1100],[1200]])) ++
 1745: 	GenPost(post_end_per_suite,
 1746: 		lists:reverse(
 1747: 		  [[1100,100],[600,200],[600,600],[700],[800],[900],[1000],
 1748: 		   [1200,1050],[1100],[1200]])) ++
 1749: 	[{?eh,tc_done,{ct_cth_prio_SUITE,end_per_suite,ok}},
 1750: 	 {?eh,test_done,{'DEF','STOP_TIME'}},
 1751: 	 {?eh,stop_logging,[]}];
 1752:

 2141: test_events(callbacks_on_skip) ->
 2142:     %% skip_cth.erl will send a 'cth_error' event if a hook is
 2143:     %% erroneously called. Therefore, all Events are changed to
 2144:     %% {negative,{?eh,cth_error,'_'},Event}
 2145:     %% at the end of this function.
 2146:     Events =
 2147:         [
 2148:          {?eh,start_logging,{'DEF','RUNDIR'}},
 2149:          {?eh,test_start,{'DEF',{'START_TIME','LOGDIR'}}},
 2150:          {?eh,cth,{empty_cth,id,[[]]}},
 2151:          {?eh,cth,{empty_cth,init,[{'_','_','_'},[]]}},
 2152:          {?eh,start_info,{6,6,15}},
 2153: 
 2154:          %% all_hook_callbacks_SUITE is skipped in spec
 2155:          %% Only the on_tc_skip callback shall be called
 2156:          {?eh,tc_user_skip,{all_hook_callbacks_SUITE,all,"Skipped in spec"}},
 2157:          {?eh,cth,{empty_cth,on_tc_skip,
 2158:                    [all_hook_callbacks_SUITE,all,
 2159:                     {tc_user_skip,"Skipped in spec"},
 2160:                     []]}},
 2161:          {?eh,test_stats,{0,0,{1,0}}},
 2162: 
 2163:          %% skip_init_SUITE is skipped in its init_per_suite function
 2164:          %% No group- or testcase-functions shall be called.
 2165:          {?eh,tc_start,{skip_init_SUITE,init_per_suite}},
 2166:          {?eh,cth,{empty_cth,pre_init_per_suite,
 2167:                    [skip_init_SUITE,
 2168:                     '$proplist',
 2169:                     []]}},
 2170:          {?eh,cth,{empty_cth,post_init_per_suite,
 2171:                    [skip_init_SUITE,
 2172:                     '$proplist',
 2173:                     {skip,"Skipped in init_per_suite/1"},
 2174:                     []]}},
 2175:          {?eh,tc_done,{skip_init_SUITE,init_per_suite,
 2176:                        {skipped,"Skipped in init_per_suite/1"}}},
 2177:          {?eh,cth,{empty_cth,on_tc_skip,
 2178:                    [skip_init_SUITE,init_per_suite,
 2179:                     {tc_user_skip,"Skipped in init_per_suite/1"},
 2180:                     []]}},
 2181:          {?eh,tc_user_skip,{skip_init_SUITE,test_case,"Skipped in init_per_suite/1"}},
 2182:          {?eh,cth,{empty_cth,on_tc_skip,
 2183:                    [skip_init_SUITE,test_case,
 2184:                     {tc_user_skip,"Skipped in init_per_suite/1"},
 2185:                     []]}},
 2186:          {?eh,test_stats,{0,0,{2,0}}},
 2187:          {?eh,tc_user_skip,{skip_init_SUITE,end_per_suite,
 2188:                             "Skipped in init_per_suite/1"}},
 2189:          {?eh,cth,{empty_cth,on_tc_skip,
 2190:                    [skip_init_SUITE,end_per_suite,
 2191:                     {tc_user_skip,"Skipped in init_per_suite/1"},
 2192:                     []]}},
 2193: 
 2194:          %% skip_req_SUITE is auto-skipped since a 'require' statement
 2195:          %% returned by suite/0 is not fulfilled.
 2196:          %% No group- or testcase-functions shall be called.

 2209:                    [skip_req_SUITE,test_case,
 2210:                     {tc_auto_skip,{require_failed_in_suite0,
 2211:                                    {not_available,whatever}}},
 2212:                     []]}},

 2283:          %% The following appears to be outside of the group, but

 2713:     [

 2935: test_events(ok) ->

 2937: 
 2938: update_config_cth_test_events(TestCaseEvents, Suite) ->
 2939:     MaybeEndPerTestcaseCrashEvents =
 2940:         case Suite of
 2941:             ct_update_config_SUITE ->
 2942:                 TestCaseEvents(test_case_timetrap_end_per_testcase_crash,
 2943:                                {timetrap_timeout,1000}) ++
 2944:                     TestCaseEvents(test_case_badmatch,
 2945:                                    {error, {{badmatch,2}, '_'}}) ++
 2946:                     TestCaseEvents(test_case_spawn_crash, {'EXIT',bam});
 2947:             _ ->
 2948:                 []
 2949:         end,
 2950:     [
 2951:      {?eh,start_logging,{'DEF','RUNDIR'}},
 2952:      {?eh,test_start,{'DEF',{'START_TIME','LOGDIR'}}},
 2953:      {?eh,cth,{'_',init,['_',[]]}},
 2954: 
 2955:      {?eh,tc_start,{Suite,init_per_suite}},
 2956:      {?eh,cth,{'_',pre_init_per_suite,
 2957: 	       [Suite,contains([]),[]]}},
 2958:      {?eh,cth,{'_',post_init_per_suite,
 2959: 	       [Suite,
 2960: 		'$proplist',
 2961: 		contains(
 2962:                   [init_per_suite,
 2963:                    pre_init_per_suite]),
 2964: 		[]]}},
 2965:      {?eh,tc_done,{Suite,init_per_suite,ok}},
 2966: 
 2967:      {?eh,tc_start,{Suite, {init_per_group,group1,[]}}},
 2968:      {?eh,cth,{'_',pre_init_per_group,
 2969: 	       [Suite,
 2970:                 group1,contains(
 2971: 			 [post_init_per_suite,
 2972: 			  init_per_suite,
 2973: 			  pre_init_per_suite]),
 2974: 		[]]}},
 2975:      {?eh,cth,{'_',post_init_per_group,
 2976: 	       [Suite,
 2977:                 group1,
 2978: 		contains(
 2979: 		  [post_init_per_suite,
 2980: 		   init_per_suite,
 2981: 		   pre_init_per_suite]),
 2982: 		contains(
 2983: 		  [init_per_group,
 2984: 		   pre_init_per_group,
 2985: 		   post_init_per_suite,
 2986: 		   init_per_suite,
 2987: 		   pre_init_per_suite]),
 2988:                 []]}},
 2989:      {?eh,tc_done,{Suite,{init_per_group,group1,[]},ok}}] ++
 2990:         TestCaseEvents(test_case, ok) ++
 2991:         TestCaseEvents(test_case_fail,
 2992:                        {error,{test_case_failed,because_i_want_failure}}) ++
 2993:         TestCaseEvents(test_case_timetrap, {timetrap_timeout,1000}) ++
 2994:         MaybeEndPerTestcaseCrashEvents ++
 2995:         [{?eh,tc_start,{Suite, {end_per_group,group1,[]}}},
 2996:          {?eh,cth,{'_',pre_end_per_group,
 2997:                    [Suite,
 2998:                     group1,contains(
 2999:                              [post_init_per_group,
 3000:                               init_per_group,
 3001:                               pre_init_per_group,
 3002:                               post_init_per_suite,
 3003:                               init_per_suite,
 3004:                               pre_init_per_suite]),
 3005:                     []]}},
 3006:          {?eh,cth,{'_',post_end_per_group,
 3007:                    [Suite,
 3008:                     group1,
 3009:                     contains(
 3010:                       [pre_end_per_group,
 3011:                        post_init_per_group,
 3012:                        init_per_group,
 3013:                        pre_init_per_group,
 3014:                        post_init_per_suite,
 3015:                        init_per_suite,
 3016:                        pre_init_per_suite]),
 3017:                     ok,[]]}},
 3018:          {?eh,tc_done,{Suite,{end_per_group,group1,[]},ok}},
 3019: 
 3020:          {?eh,tc_start,{Suite,end_per_suite}},
 3021:          {?eh,cth,{'_',pre_end_per_suite,
 3022:                    [Suite,contains(
 3023:                                              [post_init_per_suite,
 3024:                                               init_per_suite,
 3025:                                               pre_init_per_suite]),
 3026:                     []]}},
 3027:          {?eh,cth,{'_',post_end_per_suite,
 3028:                    [Suite,contains(
 3029:                                              [pre_end_per_suite,
 3030:                                               post_init_per_suite,
 3031:                                               init_per_suite,
 3032:                                               pre_init_per_suite]),
 3033:                     '_',[]]}},
 3034:          {?eh,tc_done,{Suite,end_per_suite,ok}},
 3035:          {?eh,test_done,{'DEF','STOP_TIME'}},
 3036:          {?eh,cth,{'_',terminate,[contains(
 3037:                                     [post_end_per_suite,
 3038:                                      pre_end_per_suite,
 3039:                                      post_init_per_suite,
 3040:                                      init_per_suite,
 3041:                                      pre_init_per_suite])]}},
 3042:          {?eh,stop_logging,[]}
 3043:         ].
 3044: 
 3045: %% test events help functions
 3046: contains(List) ->
 3047:     fun(Proplist) when is_list(Proplist) ->
 3048: 	    contains(List,Proplist)
 3049:     end.
 3050: 
 3051: contains([{not_in_order,List}|T],Rest) ->
 3052:     contains_parallel(List,Rest),
 3053:     contains(T,Rest);
 3054: contains([{Ele,Pos}|T] = L,[H|T2]) ->
 3055:     case element(Pos,H) of
 3056: 	Ele ->
 3057: 	    contains(T,T2);
 3058: 	_ ->
 3059: 	    contains(L,T2)
 3060:     end;
 3061: contains([Ele|T],[{Ele,_}|T2])->
 3062:     contains(T,T2);
 3063: contains([Ele|T],[Ele|T2])->
 3064:     contains(T,T2);
 3065: contains(List,[_|T]) ->
 3066:     contains(List,T);
 3067: contains([],_) ->
 3068:     match.
 3069: 
 3070: contains_parallel([Key | T], Elems) ->
 3071:     contains([Key],Elems),
 3072:     contains_parallel(T,Elems);
 3073: contains_parallel([],_Elems) ->
 3074:     match.
 3075: 
 3076: not_contains(List) ->
 3077:     fun(Proplist) when is_list(Proplist) ->
 3078: 	    [] = [Ele || {Ele,_} <- Proplist,
 3079: 			 Test <- List,
 3080: 			 Test =:= Ele]
 3081:     end.
 3082: 
 3083: hooks_order_events_helper(Suite, Recipe) ->
 3084:     BuildSettingsMap =
 3085:         fun F([{NewKey, Addition, []} | T], Acc) ->
 3086:                 F(T, Acc#{NewKey => Addition});
 3087:             F([{NewKey, Addition, RefKey} | T], Acc) ->
 3088:                 V = fun(Key, Map) -> maps:get(Key, Map) end,
 3089:                 F(T, Acc#{NewKey => Addition ++ V(RefKey, Acc)});
 3090:             F([], Acc) ->
 3091:                 Acc
 3092:         end,
 3093:     ExpectedExeSeq = BuildSettingsMap(Recipe, #{}),
 3094:     Print = fun(Key, Map) ->
 3095:                         io_lib:format("~n~10s || ~s",
 3096:                           [atom_to_list(Key),
 3097:                            [io_lib:format("~s|", [I])||
 3098:                                I <- lists:reverse(maps:get(Key, Map))]])
 3099:             end,
 3100:     ExpectedExeSeqStr = [Print(Key, ExpectedExeSeq) || {Key, _, _} <- Recipe],
 3101:     ct:log("~n~nLegend: ips - init_per_suite, ipg - init_per_group, "
 3102:            "ipt - init_per_testcase~n~n"
 3103:            "SLOT       || EXPECTED EXECUTION SEQUENCE~n"
 3104:            "-----------++----------------------------~s", [ExpectedExeSeqStr]),
 3105:     M = ExpectedExeSeq,
 3106:     V = fun(Key, Map) -> maps:get(Key, Map) end,
 3107:     [{?eh,start_logging,{'DEF','RUNDIR'}},
 3108:      {?eh,test_start,{'DEF',{'START_TIME','LOGDIR'}}},
 3109:      {?eh,cth,{'_',init,['_',[]]}},
 3110: 
 3111:      {?eh,tc_start,{Suite,init_per_suite}},
 3112:      ?cth_event3(pre_init_per_suite, Suite, contains(V(pre_ips_1, M))),
 3113:      ?cth_event3(pre_init_per_suite, Suite, contains(V(pre_ips_2, M))),
 3114:      ?cth_event4(post_init_per_suite, Suite, '$proplist', contains(V(post_ips_1, M))),
 3115:      ?cth_event4(post_init_per_suite, Suite, '$proplist', contains(V(post_ips_2, M))),
 3116:      {?eh,tc_done,{Suite,init_per_suite,ok}},
 3117:      {?eh,tc_start,{Suite, {init_per_group,group1,[]}}},
 3118:      ?cth_event4(pre_init_per_group, Suite, group1, contains(V(pre_ipg_1, M))),
 3119:      ?cth_event4(pre_init_per_group, Suite, group1, contains(V(pre_ipg_2, M))),
 3120:      ?cth_event5(post_init_per_group, Suite, group1,
 3121:                  '$proplist', contains(V(post_ipg_1, M))),
 3122:      ?cth_event5(post_init_per_group, Suite, group1,
 3123:                  '$proplist', contains(V(post_ipg_2, M))),
 3124:      {?eh,tc_done,{Suite,{init_per_group,group1,[]},ok}},
 3125: 
 3126:      {?eh,tc_start,{Suite,test_case}},
 3127:      ?cth_event4(pre_init_per_testcase, Suite, test_case, contains(V(pre_ipt_1, M))),
 3128:      ?cth_event4(pre_init_per_testcase, Suite, test_case, contains(V(pre_ipt_2, M))),
 3129:      ?cth_event5(post_init_per_testcase, Suite, test_case,
 3130:                  contains(V(post_ipt_1, M)), ok),
 3131:      ?cth_event5(post_init_per_testcase, Suite, test_case,
 3132:                  '$proplist', contains(V(post_ipt_2, M))),
 3133:      ?cth_event4(pre_end_per_testcase, Suite, test_case, contains(V(pre_ept_1, M))),
 3134:      ?cth_event4(pre_end_per_testcase, Suite, test_case, contains(V(pre_ept_2, M))),
 3135:      ?cth_event5(post_end_per_testcase, Suite, test_case,
 3136:                  contains(V(post_ept_1, M)), ok),

 3139:      {?eh,tc_done,{Suite,test_case,ok}},
